backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented romantic-site features and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text summarizing all frontend components, styles, hooks, and pages for the romantic site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling home/gallery navigation and rendering all major romantic sections and footer.
frontend/src/components/FinalMessageSect: Closing section showing a final Valentine message, signature, and decorative emojis inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsOv: Animated overlay that spawns floating heart and emoji elements rising upward across the screen.
frontend/src/components/HeroVideoSection: Hero section showing one user‑uploaded romantic video with manual play/pause control and overlay text.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: Floating button enabling optional background music playback with graceful error handling.
frontend/src/components/OpeningSection.t: Intro section with a romantic greeting, animated heart, and several loving paragraphs addressed to Vedika.
frontend/src/components/OurBestMemoriesS: Displays a framed featured photo with decorative floating hearts inside a revealable section.
frontend/src/components/OurMemoriesBackg: Shows a full-screen background image with dark overlay and a romantic text line.
Renders an interactive Valentine proposal with a 'yes' button and an evasive 'no' button, plus a success state with animations.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Provides a wrapper section that triggers a visible class on scroll using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/SoftHeartsOverla: Generates floating heart emojis that animate upward for a soft ambient overlay.
frontend/src/components/SorrySection.tsx: Shows an apology message section with styled text and emotional paragraphs.
frontend/src/components/VideosSection.ts: Displays clickable gradient cards representing memories, navigating to a gallery on click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Handles movement and teasing text for a button that dodges user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state and provides login and clearing functions via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Returns a ref and visibility state triggered when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, romantic color variables, gradients, frames, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: React page that displays a curated list of five user-provided photos in a romantic grid with a back button, soft overlays, and themed styling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, fonts, and container settings for a romantic theme, with plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the SPA’s romantic React/Tailwind structure, features, and versioned capability list.
